formal_status.description: Formal Diagnosis as described in manuscript

Dataset.description: Which publication the session belongs to

sessSeason.description: Season of the sessions measurment meteorologically (Winter: December 1rst to March 1rst, Spring: March 1rst to June 1rst, Summer: June 1rst to September 1rst, Fall: September 1rst to December 1rst)

sessTime.description: measurement in morning <12pm or in the afternoon >12pm

Responder.description: response to treatment (for ADHD_NF: either ADHD_post_Hyp or ADHD_post_Att improved with 25%; or for MDD-rTMS: BDI-post improved with more than 50% from BDI-pre);for OCD: post-YBOCS total improved with more than 35% from pre-YBOCS

sessID.description: session number of the eeg acquisition session (ascending)

nrSessions.description: total number of sessions measured for the particular subject

neoFFI_q2.description: I like to have a lot of people around me

neoFFI_q3.description: I don’t like to waste my time daydreaming

neoFFI_q4.description: I try to be courteous to everyone I meet

neoFFI_q5.description: I keep my belongings neat and clean

neoFFI_q6.description: I often feel inferior to others

neoFFI_q8.description: Once I find the right way to do something

neoFFI_q9.description: I often get into arguments with my family and co-workers

neoFFI_q10.description: I am pretty good about pacing myself so as to get things done on time

neoFFI_q11.description: When I’m under a great deal of stress, sometimes I feel like I’m going to pieces

neoFFI_q12.description: I don’t consider myself especially “light hearted”

neoFFI_q13.description: I am intrigued by the patterns I find in art and nature

neoFFI_q14.description: Some people think I am selfish and egotistical

neoFFI_q15.description: I am not a very methodical person

neoFFI_q16.description: I rarely feel lonely or blue

neoFFI_q17.description: I really enjoy talking to people

neoFFI_q18.description: I believe letting students hear controversial speakers can only confuse and mislead them

neoFFI_q19.description: I would rather cooperate with others that compete with them

neoFFI_q20.description: I try to perform all the tasks assigned to me conscientiously

neoFFI_q21.description: I often feel tense and jittery

neoFFI_q22.description: I like to be where the action is

neoFFI_q23.description: Poetry has little or no effect on me

neoFFI_q24.description: I tend to be cynical and skeptical of other’s intentions

neoFFI_q25.description: I have a clear set of goals and work toward them in an orderly fashion

neoFFI_q27.description: I usually prefer to do things alone

neoFFI_q28.description: I often try new and foreign foods

neoFFI_q29.description: I believe that most people will take advantage of you if you let them

neoFFI_q30.description: I waste a lot of time before settling down to work

neoFFI_q31.description: I rarely feel fearful or anxious: 1 = Totally agree

neoFFI_q32.description: I often feel as if I’m bursting with energy

neoFFI_q33.description: I seldom notice the moods or feelings that different environments produce

neoFFI_q34.description: Most people I know like me

neoFFI_q35.description: I work hard to accomplish my goals

neoFFI_q36.description: I often get angry at the way people treat me

neoFFI_q37.description: I am a cheerful, high-spirited person

neoFFI_q38.description: I believe we should look to our religious authorities for decisions on moral issues

neoFFI_q39.description: Some people think of me as cold and calculating

neoFFI_q40.description: When I make a comment, I can always be counted on to follow through

neoFFI_q41.description: Too often when things go wrong, I get discouraged and feel like giving up

neoFFI_q42.description: I am not a cheerful optimist

neoFFI_q43.description: Sometimes when I am reading poetry or looking at a work of art

neoFFI_q44.description: I’m hard-hearted and tough-minded in my attitudes

neoFFI_q45.description: Sometimes I’m not as dependable or reliable as I should be

neoFFI_q46.description: I am seldom sad or depressed

neoFFI_q48.description: I have little interest in speculating on the nature of the universe or the human condition

neoFFI_q49.description: I generally try to be thoughtful and considerate

neoFFI_q50.description: I am a productive person who always gets the job done

neoFFI_q51.description: I often feel helpless and want someone else to solve my problems

neoFFI_q52.description: I am a very active person

neoFFI_q53.description: I have a lot of intellectual curiosity:

neoFFI_q54.description: If I don’t like people, I let them know it

neoFFI_q55.description: I never seem to be able to get organized

neoFFI_q56.description: At times I have been so ashamed I just wanted to hide

neoFFI_q57.description: I would rather go my own way than be a leader of others

neoFFI_q58.description: I often enjoy playing with theories or abstract ideas

neoFFI_q59.description: If necessary, I am willing to manipulate people to get what I want

neoFFI_q60.description: I strive for excellence in everything I do

avg_rt_oddb_CP.description: average reaction time in the auditory oddbal task; correct positives

avg_rt_oddb_FP.description: average reaction time in the auditory oddbal task; false positives

n_oddb_CP.description: number of correct positives in the auditory oddball task

n_oddb_FP.description: number of false positives  in the auditory oddball task

n_oddb_CN.description: number of correct negatives in the auditory oddball task

n_oddb_FN.description: number of false negatives  in the auditory oddball task

avg_rt_wm_CP.description: average reaction time in the visual 1-back task; correct positives

avg_rt_wm_FP.description: average reaction time in the visual 1-back task; false positives

n_wm_CP.description: number of correct positives in the the visual 1-back task

n_wm_FP.description: number of false positives  in the the visual 1-back task

n_wm_CN.description: number of correct negatives in the the visual 1-back task

n_wm_FN.description: number of false negatives  in the visual 1-back task

cigarette.description: how many hours ago did you smoke a cigarette? (99 means never)

coffee.description: how many hours ago did you consume coffee(99 means never)

beer.description: how many hours ago did you consume alcohol? (99 means never)

drugs.description: how many hours ago did you take drugs? (99 means never)

education.description: what is your education level? maximum of 18 years

meal.description: how many hours ago did you have a meal?

sleep.description: how many hours did you sleep last night?

well.description: how are you feeling overall today compared to other days?

levels.0: confirmation of normal or corrected to normal vision

BDI Pre.description: Total score of the BDI* at Baseline (*Becks depression inventory - NL)

BDI Post.description: Total score of the BDI Post treatment

rTMS PROTOCOL.description: the protocol that was used in rTMS treatment

ADHD_post_Hyp.description: total ADHD-RS post treatment hyperactivity score

ADHD_post_Att.description: total ADHD-RS post treatment inattention score

NF Protocol.description: the protocol that was used in neurofeedback treatment
